description:
Archery Blast offers an ultra-realistic archery experience with stunning 3D graphics, amazing animations and simple intuitive controls. Shoot arrows at targets usually placed at different distances to complete levels.

Main Features:
* Console-quality 3D graphics and authentic shooting action
* Polished animation and realistic 3D graphics.
* Different locations: Buddhist temple, sea, rain forest...
* Simple and intuitive control: hold to aim and release to shoot
* Cross over 60 levels
name: Archery Blast
